name: Zombies out of control
description:
You have to control the zombies by shooting them. And you need to take them to the medical car.

Controls:

Rotate - Mouse

Forward - Up/W

Backward - Down/S

Shoot - Space

Sprites - https://craftpix.net/product/zombie-tds-main-characters/

Music - https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/
